page.title: 12The Headmaster
page.content: The Headmaster has been at West Buckland School for six and a half years.The greatest development he has seen here is the introduction of girls.They first came in September 1980 and according to the headmaster they have improved the quality of the school making everyone happier so they work much better. A normal day for the headmaster begins at 6.30 when he gets up.He plans his day while having breakfast.He spends most of his time dicussing pupils with their parents and teachers and plannin the future of the school. The headmaster is involved with the school Combined Cadet Force and feels it is an important aspect of a pupils education. The headmaster lives in a house in the school buildings but goes away for holidays.
